original: Lindblad, Hugo Stefan, arkitekt SAR, Trollhättan, f. 4/7/97 i Bjuv, Malmöh. 1., av bergsing. Robert L. o Agnes Bergström. G. 27 m. Signe Bo-beck. Barn: Inga f. 30, Ann Mari o. Britta 38. — Utex. fr. CTH 19, stud. v. Univ. of Michigan, USA, 26. Anst, v. arkitikont. i USA 20-3’5, egen arkit:-verksamb. sed. 37. Byggn :konsulent i Bengtsfors, Mellerud, Ed o. Bäckefors.
translated:
Lindblad, Hugo Stefan, architect SAR, Trollhättan, b. 4/7/1897 in Bjuv, Malmöhus County. Firstborn son of miner Robert L. and Agnes Bergström. Married on the 27th of the month 

with Signe Bo-beck. Children: Inga b. 1930, Ann Mari and Britta b. 1938. — Graduated from CTH in 1919, studied at the University of Michigan, USA, 1926. Employed at architectural firms in the USA from 1920-1935, began his own architectural business in 1937. Provided building consultancy services in Bengtsfors, Mellerud, Ed, and Bäckefors.
